H0.text: An American ban lasting 21 years was lifted in 2010 for what Scottish food. Neeps

H1.text: An American ban lasting 21 years was lifted in 2010 for what Scottish food. Cullen Skink

H2.text: An American ban lasting 21 years was lifted in 2010 for what Scottish food. Aberdeen Angus Beef

H3.text: An American ban lasting 21 years was lifted in 2010 for what Scottish food. Hagus

A4.text: The ban on food containing sheep lung remains in force.

A5.text: Haggis cannot be exported to the United States, it is instead made there, sometimes by Scottish companies.
